directions: In a large bowl combine pineapple with juice and pudding mix. Whisk together until well blended.
Fold whipped topping into pineapple and spoon mixture into graham cracker crust. Refrigerate at least 3 hours before serving.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple with juice
1 (3.5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
1 (12 ounce) container fat free frozen whipped topping
title: Dream Pie
